Sentencas: (WO3)(0.15)(BiO1.5)(0.85) exhibits a tetragonal structure derived from the fluorite subcell.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of cubic fluorite-based (YO1.5)x(WO3)0.15(BiO1.5)0.85-x (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) solid solutions

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of (WO3)(0.15)(BiO1.5)(0.85) is lower than that of Y2O3-doped Bi2O3.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of cubic fluorite-based (YO1.5)x(WO3)0.15(BiO1.5)0.85-x (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) solid solutions

Sentencas: The structure and electrical conductivity of samples formulated as (YO1.5)(x)(WO3)(0.15)(BiO1.5)(0.85-)(x) (x = 0.1, 0.2, 0.3, and 0.4) were investigated.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of cubic fluorite-based (YO1.5)x(WO3)0.15(BiO1.5)0.85-x (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) solid solutions

Sentencas: The as-sintered (YO1.5)(0.1)(WO3)(0.15)(BiO1.5)(0.75) exhibited a single cubic structure that is isostructural with delta-Bi2O3.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of cubic fluorite-based (YO1.5)x(WO3)0.15(BiO1.5)0.85-x (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) solid solutions

Sentencas: For x = 0.2, 0.3, and 0.4, the as-sintered samples consisted of a cubic fluorite structure and rhombohedral Y6WO12.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of cubic fluorite-based (YO1.5)x(WO3)0.15(BiO1.5)0.85-x (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) solid solutions

Sentencas: After heat treatment at 600 degrees C for 200 h, the cubic structures are stable for x = 0.1, 0.3, and 0.4.
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of cubic fluorite-based (YO1.5)x(WO3)0.15(BiO1.5)0.85-x (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) solid solutions

Sentencas: A transformation from cubic to rhombohedral phase after heat treatment at 600 degrees C for 200 h was observed in the sample originally formulated as (YO1.5)(0.2)(WO3)(0.15)(BiO1.5)(0.65).
Titulo: Crystal structure and electrical conductivity of cubic fluorite-based (YO1.5)x(WO3)0.15(BiO1.5)0.85-x (0 ≤ x ≤ 0.4) solid solutions
